text: haey chaur eng luonglom champoh anaknea del anak ach luong lom ban knongchamnaom puokke daoy saamleng robsa eng( daoy ampeav neav aoy daer phlauv khosapi karnenam robsa a l laoh) choh . haey chaur anak bramoul tpseh robsa eng ning tp thae m r cheung robsa eng brachheang nung puok ke . haey chaur eng chaulruom cheamuoy puokke nowknong tropy sa mb tde ning kaun chaw( dauchchea rk brakkasa knong phlauv khosachbab changkar ning kar ruomphet) . haey chaur eng sanyea nung puokke choh . bo nde shai t n minban sanyea avei nung puokke krawpi karbaokabrasa noh laey
